title: Manohari Pushpa Haaram: Rose Gold Diamond and Pearl Blossom Necklace
materials: South Sea Pearls (Moti: 22.65; 7 pearls). Exhibits a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: A breathtaking floral design Haaram. Each blossom is intricately crafted with pave-set diamonds and delicate pink gemstones. The design features floral motifs with a prominent central flower pendant drop. The pearls are strategically placed to enhance the overall elegance and grandeur. The rose gold setting gives a modern touch to this traditional design. The craftsmanship reflects the renowned Hyderabadi tradition of meticulous detail.
colors: Creamy White (Pearls). This pastel palette offers a refreshing and contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry.
occasions: Perfect for a modern bride on her Muhurtham
or an upscale gala. Also ideal for special occasions such as Seemantham (baby shower) or a half-saree function where a touch of elegance and tradition is desired.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a statement piece blending modern aesthetics with traditional Indian design. The use of rose gold, diamonds, colored diamonds, and pearls creates a unique and luxurious look. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty, making it a cherished heirloom for generations. Its eye-catching floral design embodies femininity and grace.
